page.title: 09ABBOTSHOLME SCHOOL
page.content: The school participates in a great deal of Outdoor Pursuits,which is a timetabled subject for younger pupils. Compulsory camps and hikes take place each year in which sailing,canoeing, windsurfing,rock climbing and caving are done,as well as camping and walking skills.Games/Sport are taught 3 afternoons each week along with Estate work where pupils help to upkeep the grounds and buildings. At the end of the Summer term, parents and friends of the school are invited to camp at school for 3 days. This takes the form of a Summer Gathering and various events take place such as classroom displays,Roseyard plays, speeches and athletics,swimming and horse-riding competitions between 'Houses'. The school has a number of trophies and cups for inter-house events.
